about.description:
The LSC Algorithm Burst Library for gravitational wave data analysis.
This package contains the python bindings.

name: python-lalburst
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.17.8
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: python-lalburst
    version: 1.5.0
source:
    fn: lalburst-1.5.0.tar.xz
    patches:
        - python3-git_version.patch
    sha256: 2918c61c8c767bfa1fc2d439e9b7ca15e0e7a186ec045a6b563f9dcb6c1a1ca2
    url: http://software.ligo.org/lscsoft/source/lalsuite/lalburst-1.5.0.tar.xz
build:
    activate_in_script: true
    number: 1002
    string: py36h917ab60_1002
requirements:
    build:
        - cctools 895 h7512d6f_0
        - clang 4.0.1 h662ec87_0
        - clang_osx-64 4.0.1 h1ce6c1d_11
        - compiler-rt 4.0.1 h5487866_0

        - llvm-lto-tapi 4.0.1 h6701bc3_0
        - make 4.2.1 h1de35cc_2004
        - pcre 8.41 h0a44026_1003
        - pkg-config 0.29.2 h112b980_1004
        - swig 3.0.12 h0a44026_1003
    host:
        - asn1crypto 0.24.0 py36_1003
        - blas 1.1 openblas
        - ca-certificates 2018.11.29 ha4d7672_0
        - certifi 2018.11.29 py36_1000
        - cffi 1.12.1 py36h342bebf_0
        - cryptography 2.5 py36hdbc3d79_1
        - fftw 3.3.8 h1de35cc_1002
        - gsl 2.4 blas_openblashaeb7eea_1004
        - hdf5 1.10.4 nompi_h646315f_1105
        - idna 2.8 py36_1000
        - lal 6.19.1 hdbf577b_1000
        - lalburst 1.5.0 h53c389d_1002
        - lalmetaio 1.4.0 h53c389d_1001
        - lalsimulation 1.8.1 h53c389d_0
        - libcxx 7.0.0 h2d50403_2
        - libffi 3.2.1 h0a44026_1005
        - libgfortran 3.0.1 0
        - ligo-common 1.0.3 py_0
        - ligo-segments 1.2.0 py36h1de35cc_0
        - llvm-meta 7.0.0 0
        - llvm-openmp 4.0.1 hcfea43d_1
        - lscsoft-glue 1.60.0 py36h1de35cc_1
        - metaio 8.5.1 ha441bb4_1000
        - ncurses 6.1 h0a44026_1002
        - numpy 1.9.3 py36_blas_openblash4251c03_1207
        - openblas 0.3.3 hdc02c5d_1001
        - openssl 1.0.2p h1de35cc_1002
        - pycparser 2.19 py_0
        - pyopenssl 19.0.0 py36_0
        - python 3.6.7 h4a56312_1002
        - python-dateutil 2.8.0 py_0
        - python-lal 6.19.1 py36h917ab60_1000
        - python-lalmetaio 1.4.0 py36h917ab60_1001
        - python-lalsimulation 1.8.1 py36h917ab60_0
        - readline 7.0 hcfe32e1_1001
        - scipy 1.2.1 py36_blas_openblash486cb9f_0
        - setuptools 40.8.0 py36_0
        - six 1.12.0 py36_1000
        - sqlite 3.26.0 h1765d9f_1000
        - tk 8.6.9 ha441bb4_1000
        - xz 5.2.4 h1de35cc_1001
        - zlib 1.2.11 h1de35cc_1004
    run:
        - lalburst 1.5.0 h53c389d_1002
        - lscsoft-glue <2.0a0
        - matplotlib
        - numpy >=1.9.3,<2.0a0
        - python >=3.6,<3.7.0a0
        - python-lal >=6.19.0
        - python-lalmetaio >=1.4.0
        - python-lalsimulation >=1.8.0
        - scipy
test:
    commands:
        - conda inspect linkages -p ${PREFIX} ${PKG_NAME}
        - conda inspect objects -p ${PREFIX} ${PKG_NAME}
    imports:
        - lalburst
        - lalburst.SimBurstUtils
        - lalburst.SnglBurstUtils
        - lalburst.binjfind
        - lalburst.bucluster
        - lalburst.burca
        - lalburst.burca_tailor
        - lalburst.cafe
        - lalburst.calc_likelihood
        - lalburst.cs_gamma
        - lalburst.date
        - lalburst.packing
        - lalburst.snglcluster
        - lalburst.snglcoinc
        - lalburst.timeslides
about:
    description: 'The LSC Algorithm Burst Library for gravitational wave data analysis.

        This package contains the python bindings.'
    dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/lscsoft/lalsuite/
    doc_url: https://lscsoft.docs.ligo.org/lalsuite/lalburst/
    home: https://wiki.ligo.org/Computing/DASWG/LALSuite
    license: GPLv3
    license_family: GPL
    license_file: COPYING
    summary: LSC Algorithm Burst Library
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - duncanmmacleod
        - skymoo
